name: Simtech Aviation Training Limited
about: Simtech Aviation Training Limited is an award-winning aviation training facility located near Dublin International Airport, Ireland. As a recognized European leader and Approved Training Organisation (ATO), we work closely with over 15 airlines across Boeing, Airbus, and ATR aircraft types. With 21 years of experience, we specialize in EASA required APS/MCC and MCC/JOC courses, as well as type-rating courses. Our state-of-the-art simulators, including fixed-base and full-motion models, are maintained by a highly specialized engineering team. Our instructors, many of whom are former airline pilots, provide personalized and industry-leading training. We are certified by EASA and the UK CAA, ensuring the highest standards in aviation training. Our mission is to deliver world-class professional training solutions that exceed customer expectations.
